ygData.messageBody:
> And personally, it has always been my idea that an SK feeds off the life
> force of the weak, so after a fight walking around and sucking
> the life out of gnolls and orcs sounds very in character...

Except that this would mean again that lifetaps are reserved mostly for
soloing SK's. A non-soloing SK would most likely be down in a dungeon where
there are no puny gnolls or orcs to suck the life out of.

Also, as I stated before, assuming that the lifetaps follow previous
patterns, the amount of life that they would tap would likely be so small
that the time spent finding a creature, casting on it and then the extra med
time for the mana would probably be as much time as it would have taken to
heal that much health while sitting on your bum. Especially for trolls
(which I am not) with regeneration.

virten
